citation: National Parks and Reserves Management (Emblems) Order 2003 (Tas)
text:
National Parks and Reserves Management (Emblems) Order 2003

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following order under section 11 of the National Parks and Reserves Management Act 2002 .

15 September 2003

G. S. M. Green

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

J. A. Bacon

Minister for Tourism, Parks and Heritage

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the National Parks and Reserves Management (Emblems) Order 2003 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Adoption of authorised emblems
        (1) For the purposes of section 11 of the National Parks and Reserves Management Act 2002 , the emblems shown in Schedule 1 to this order are the authorised emblems to be adopted for use by the Director.
        (2) The authorised emblems may be adopted for use by the Director in any one or more colours.

4. Revocation of order
    The National Parks and Wildlife Service (Emblem) Order 1976 is revoked.

SCHEDULE 1 - Emblems

Clause 3(1)

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 24 September 2003

This order is administered in the Department of Tourism, Parks, Heritage and the Arts.
